Name: Batida
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
(ALTERNATIVELY, BLEND all ingredients with crushed ice.)
Review: Thick and creamy with fortifying underlying cachaça spirit.
History: Originating from Brazil, in Portuguese, batida means shaken or milkshake. Along with the Caipirinha, the Batida could be considered the country's national drink. Both drinks are based on Brazil's national spirit, cachaça.
Nutrition: One serving of Batida contains 172 calories
